titleStmt.title: The Christians zodiake, or, Twelve signes of predestination unto life everlasting written in Lattin by Ieremie Drexelius.
Zodiacus Christianus locupletatus. English
titleStmt.author: Drexel, Jeremias, 1581-1638.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained with print show-through; tightly bound with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
